snippet: In a newly rediscovered interview from the 1950s, W. Eugene Smith discussed a then-controversial and now taboo practice in documentary photography: the staging of photographs.
abstract: In a newly rediscovered interview from the 1950s, W. Eugene Smith discussed a then-controversial and now taboo practice in documentary photography: the staging of photographs.

headline.main: W. Eugene Smith: 'I Didn't Write the Rules, Why Should I Follow Them?'
